name: ESCAPE (itch) (tfrei)
description:
ESCAPE is a short game where you have to search for clues in a room so that you can find the key to the exit door.

This game was made with Unity and the source code are available at my github profile:

https://github.com/freitagtiago/EscapeFromBedroom3D

The game has taken 10 days to be developed.

Credits

Programming

Tiago Freitag
